document_data.name: Spouting Fish
document_data.text: A bit like drinking in the thick of a street brawl.
document_data.source: A patron of the Spouting Fish
document_data.mainbody: The Spouting Fish was notoriously noisy and boisterous.
document_data.Location: The tavern was located on the east side of the [[Way of the Dragon (Waterdeep)|Way of the Dragon]], at the corner where it turned north after branching west from the [[High Road (Waterdeep)|High Road]] at the [[Waymoot (Waterdeep)|Waymoot]]. Its popularity was largely due to its strategic location, which prompted many travelers entering the city from [[South Gate]] to stop there for a drink.
document_data.Structure: The tavern was characterized by a large water fountain shaped like an upright spouting fish. The large building had several floors built with a labyrinthine structure.

The Spouting Fish was notoriously noisy and boisterous.

document_data.Services:
The tavern offered numerous drinks, including [[zzar]], [[wine]]s, and [[beer]]s. The food, which included roast fowl, sausages, and [[bread]], was heavily [[salt]]ed to induce patrons to consume more beverages.

Another reason for the tavern's popularity was intense advertising performed by street criers across the city.
document_data.History: By the {{YearlinkName|1492}},{{Waterdeep-time}} the sewer intersection that connected to the Spouting Fish's cellar was an access point to one of the [[Xanathar Guild]] hideouts. It was guarded by a [[gazer]].
